sentences.en: And though it requires sacrifice, it brings a deeper fulfillment.
sentences.cn: 虽然承担责任意味着牺牲个人利益, 但是你能从中体会到一种更加深刻的成就感.

sentences.en: Ensure an effective operation planning and process to support the order fulfillment and delivery requirement.
sentences.cn: 确保有效的运作计划和流程来支持订单的履行和交货要求。

sentences.en: For the youth generation, self - fulfillment and self - expression became very important.
sentences.cn: 为青年世代, 自我 实现和 自我 表现变得非常重要.

sentences.en: Happiness is the real sense of fulfillment that comes from hard work.
sentences.cn: 快乐是从勤奋工作中得到的一种事实在在的成就感.

sentences.en: He attained his own destiny. Then there is fulfillment.
sentences.cn: 他实行了自己的使命, 那时就有了满足.

sentences.en: He was willing to face any hardship in fulfillment of his duty.
sentences.cn: 他愿意面对任何困难去履行他的职责.

sentences.en: I get great joy and fulfillment from helping others.
sentences.cn: 我从帮助别人的过程当中获得快乐和满足.

sentences.en: I wish you success and fulfillment in the years ahead.
sentences.cn: 祝你事业成功,幸福美满,万事如意.

sentences.en: It's a matter of self - fulfillment.
sentences.cn: 这在于能否实现个人抱负.

sentences.en: More importantly, China's fulfillment of these commitments will firstly benefit itself.
sentences.cn: 他同时指出, 中国履行这些承诺首先有利于中国.

sentences.en: So fulfillment of desires is a prerequisite to unity.
sentences.cn: 所以实现愿望是到达统一的先决条件.

sentences.en: Talking and relating to another is a source of tremendous fulfillment.
sentences.cn: 交谈与联系是让她们感到满足的巨大源泉之一.

sentences.en: The fulfillment of my dream is apparently as far off as ever.
sentences.cn: 我梦想的实现显然是遥遥无期.

sentences.en: Third, the fulfillment of work safety control indicators was relatively good.
sentences.cn: 三是安全生产控制指标实施情况较好.

sentences.en: This contract is binding subject to the fulfillment of the following conditions.
sentences.cn: 本合同须满足下列条件方始生效.

sentences.en: Who, I thought, wants to know about the other's earlier relationships, if he or she is not the fulfillment of their promise?
sentences.cn: 如果他或她不只履行他们的承诺的话，我认为，谁想去知道别人以前跟另一个异性的关系呢？

sentences.en: You must value your relationships because they give your fulfillment.
sentences.cn: 你必须注重你的人际关系,因为它让你有满足感.

words.tran_cn: 履行；实现；满足；使结束（等于fulfil）

trans.tran_cn: 完成，实现，满足（感），实施过程
